title: 一齊寫信多謝段校長(有template)

replies.msg:
Dear Professor Tuan,


I am writing to express my admiration for your support to our family members in a difficult time. 


I share your concerns about the physical and emotional well-being of the students. I am sure your letter must be like a drizzle in the drought to my fellows. It must be a difficult decision for you given the stress from different stakeholders and the risk on your personal interest, if not safety. I am glad that you still stand with our fellows, act in good faith and speak with conscience. I entirely share your view that a fair investigation has to be carried out and the force should be condemned if excessive violence proves to be involved. 


To close my letter, I would like to share a word appearing on my mind which is a common theme among many literary pieces, grandeur, which refers to courage of human in the most difficult times. The courage you have fully echoes with the core value of CUHK, humanity. May our common wish come true in the imminent future, the precious and beautiful spiritual wealth of Hong Kong will be rekindled with brightness and vigour.


Again, thanks for your contribution to CUHK. (I feel proud to be a student of CUHK.) All the best.


Yours respectfully,

一定要攬，大家諗返張建宗當日道歉，比狗屌到轉埋方向。

如果當日支持張建宗聲音夠，我地爭取既已經會成功，之後唔會有咁多人死...
